alert.note: Alert for Brown; Coleman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 4:55PM CDT until May 06 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Brown County in west central Texas... East central Coleman County in west central Texas... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 455 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Thrifty, or near Bangs, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Lake Brownwood Near Thrifty and Lake Brownwood around 510 PM CDT. Grosvenor around 515 PM CDT. Lake Brownwood State Park around 520 PM CDT. Byrds around 530 PM CDT. Burkett around 535 PM CDT. Cross Cut around 545 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Thrifty. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
